The Chex Quest equivalent to the BFG Ball. Acts identically. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== Actor LAZBall : {{Class|BFGBall}} { {{Property|RenderStyle}} Translucent {{Property|Obituary}} "$OB_MPLAZ_BOOM" // "%o fell prey to %k's LAZ device." {{Property|Alpha}} 0.75 }
